sourcesContent:
Mission List

  • {{ launch.mission_name }}

    Launch Year: {{ launch.launch_year }}

    Details: {{ launch.details }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-missionlist', templateUrl: './missionlist.component.html', styleUrls: ['./missionlist.component.scss'] }) export class MissionlistComponent implements OnInit { launches: any[] = []; // yearFilter: string = ''; yearFilter: string | Event = ''; // Change the type to string | Event constructor(private http: HttpClient, private router: Router) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.http.get('https://api.spacexdata.com/v3/launches').subscribe(data => { this.launches = data; }); } applyFilter(): void { if (this.yearFilter) { this.http.get(`https://api.spacexdata.com/v3/launches?launch_year=${this.yearFilter}`).subscribe(data => { this.launches = data; }); } else { this.http.get('https://api.spacexdata.com/v3/launches').subscribe(data => { this.launches = data; }); } } showDetails(flightNumber: string): void { this.router.navigateByUrl(`/missions/${flightNumber}`); } }
